DOC.detailed_description: Experiment 1 . Male high school football athlete ( n= 270 ) complete battery test include Star Excursion Balance Test ( SEBT ) , divide attention gait task , Psychomotor Vigilance Task ( PVT ) , Change Direction ( COD ) Illinois agility test ( IAGT ) . The SEBT establish , reliable outcome measure dynamic postural stability measurement low extremity reach distance . Our study also utilize force plate SEBT test allow investigator sensitively measure center mass plane .
